sovereign_operating_systems.rationale: Sovereign AI defense grid and GovTech Prime status.

power_utilities.rationale: Physical power needs of the AI build-out (data centers).

bitcoin.rationale: Hedge against monetary debasement, FASB adoption, and sovereign accumulation.

industrial_commodities.rationale: Hedge against tariff inflation and physical infrastructure needs.

short_duration_treasuries.rationale: Cash equivalent to deploy during volatility.

tactical_underweights.rationale: Heavy CRE exposure facing the 2026 Maturity Wall.
Erosion of purchasing power for bottom 50% due to sticky inflation.

architect_notes: This 'Barbell' strategy is designed for the 'Reflationary Agentic Boom' regime. It pairs high-beta exposure to the structural winners of the AI/Agentic revolution with hard assets (Bitcoin/Commodities) that benefit from fiscal dominance and geopolitical fragmentation, while avoiding interest-rate sensitive sectors.
